reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor. Her lectures are clear, and she always makes time for her students.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is very knowledgeable, but sometimes his explanations can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Miller knows her stuff, but her exams are tough. Be prepared to study hard.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Smith makes history come alive! His passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is knowledgeable, but her lectures are hard to follow. The material is challenging.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is a great teacher, but his exams are tricky. Pay attention to the details.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a fantastic professor. She makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry. You need to stay focused.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is an excellent professor. She encourages critical thinking and class participation.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. White is inspiring. His lectures are thought-provoking and engaging.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is a brilliant professor. Her passion for literature shines through in every lecture.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is well-informed, but his grading is strict. You need to work hard to get a good grade.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Clark has a deep knowledge of art history, but her exams can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is passionate about the environment. His lectures are informative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is a great professor, but her assignments are time-consuming. Be prepared to put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Hall's lectures are not very engaging. The material is useful, but his delivery needs improvement.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Young is an outstanding professor. She makes learning about languages fun and interesting.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. King is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be confusing at times. You need to ask questions.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Green is a great professor. She makes geology exciting, but her exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Allen's lectures are mind-opening. He challenges you to think critically about everything.
